遠人.definition: an estranged person; sb who is alienated; people far from home

遠來的和尚會念經.pinyin: yuan3 lai2 de5 he2 shang5 hui4 nian4 jing1
遠來的和尚會念經.definition: the monk coming from afar is good at reading scriptures (idiom); foreign talent is valued higher than local talent

遠勞.definition: (courteous expression) you have made a long and exhausting journey; you will be making a long trip (when asking a favor that involves going to a faraway place)

遠嫁.definition: to marry a man who lives in a distant place

遠安.definition: Yuan'an county in Yichang 宜昌[Yi2 chang1], Hubei

遠安縣.definition: Yuan'an county in Yichang 宜昌[Yi2 chang1], Hubei

遠征.definition: an expedition, esp. military; march to remote regions

遠征軍.definition: expeditionary force; army on a distant expedition

遠志.definition: far-reaching ambition; lofty ideal; milkwort (Polygala myrtifolia), with roots used in Chinese medicine

遠慮.definition: long-term considerations; to take the long view

遠日點.definition: aphelion, the furthest point of a planet in elliptic orbit to the sun; opposite: perihelion 近日點|近日点[jin4 ri4 dian3]; higher apsis

遠景.definition: scenery in the distance; long-term prospects; (photography) long shot

遠望.definition: to gaze afar; to look into the distance

遠期.definition: long-term; at a fixed date in the future (e.g. for repayment); abbr. for 遠期合約|远期合约[yuan3 qi1 he2 yue1]

遠東山雀.definition: (bird species of China) Japanese tit (Parus minor)

遠東樹鶯.definition: (bird species of China) Manchurian bush warbler (Horornis canturians)

遠東葦鶯.definition: (bird species of China) Manchurian reed warbler (Acrocephalus tangorum)

遠水不救近火.pinyin: yuan3 shui3 bu4 jiu4 jin4 huo3
遠水不救近火.definition: see 遠水救不了近火|远水救不了近火[yuan3 shui3 jiu4 bu5 liao3 jin4 huo3]

遠水不解近渴.pinyin: yuan3 shui3 bu4 jie3 jin4 ke3
遠水不解近渴.definition: lit. distant water does not cure present thirst; fig. urgent need; a slow remedy does not address immediate needs

遠水救不了近火.pinyin: yuan3 shui3 jiu4 bu5 liao3 jin4 huo3
遠水救不了近火.definition: water in a distant place is of little use in putting out a fire right here; (fig.) a slow remedy does not address the current emergency

遠洋.definition: distant seas; the open ocean (far from the coast)

遠端.definition: the far end (of an object); remote (i.e. operating from a distance or over a computer network); (anatomy) distal

遠航.definition: to travel a great distance by sea or air; voyage; long-haul flight

遠行.definition: a long journey; far from home

遠親不如近鄰.pinyin: yuan3 qin1 bu4 ru2 jin4 lin2
遠親不如近鄰.definition: A relative afar is less use than a close neighbor (idiom). Take whatever help is on hand, even from strangers.

遠謀.definition: a long-term plan; an ambitious strategy

遠走高飛.definition: to go far; to escape to faraway places

遠超.definition: to exceed by far; to greatly surpass

遠超過.definition: to exceed by far; to outclass

遠近聞名.definition: to be known far and wide; to be well-known

遠逝.definition: to fade into the distance; (fig.) to peter out; to fade away

遠避.definition: to keep at a distance; to forsake

遠郊.definition: outer suburbs; remote outskirts of a city

遠門.definition: (to go to) distant parts; faraway; a distant relative

遠隔千里.definition: thousands of miles away; far away

遠離.definition: to be far from; to keep away from
